Text: don't be a dork. do your own thinking.indeed. the guy that did this bombing is on cctv footage from various cameras driving up to the spot the bomb went off, parking his car, getting out, walking out of his car, checking out his parking job and leaving the scene of HIS crime, before, the car blew up. All of which he has according to his lawyer admitted quite openly and readily.Some things are as simple as they seem and you do a disservice to yourself and others by trying to make this incident to be more or less than the atrocity it is. If you are indeed sincere in your desire to root out conspiracies, best that you look elsewhere and put your energy to constructive use.
